document.full_text: a woman arrested outside the home of tv talk show host ellen degeneres and actress portia de rossi last month was sentenced to three years' probation on monday after pleading no contest to trespassing.
document.title: ellen degeneres trespasser gets probation in la
lines_and_colors: a woman arrested outside the home of tv talk show host ellen degeneres and actress portia de rossi last month was sentenced to three years' probation on monday after pleading no contest to trespassing.
